comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
The jcr-client module does not build anymore for me. I've changed the scope of the jcr2spi dependency from test to default (->compile).

svn revision: 816544

comments.author: Michael Dürig
comments.body:
Some how the orphaned AbstractRepositoryConfig was not removed by my initial commit. This kept a dependency on jcr2spi. 

Fixing with revision: 816558

summary: Remove excessive dependencies from jcr-client module
